rows.label: bf11590150_0010
rows.name: What good was your militia?

rows.label: bf11590150_0020
rows.name:
They could not halt Metsu,
nor even safeguard the seal from his clutches.

rows.label: bf11590150_0030
rows.name: I have no excuses.

rows.label: bf11590150_0040
rows.name: Adel...

rows.label: bf11590150_0050
rows.name: Hmph.

rows.label: bf11590150_0060
rows.name: Majesty. This is a deep dishonor.

rows.label: bf11590150_0070
rows.name:
I beseech you to lay them low,
that the people may have faith in government!

rows.label: bf11590150_0080
rows.name: Majesty!

rows.label: bf11590150_0090
rows.name: Brother, your advice is wise.

rows.label: bf11590150_0100
rows.name: Your Majesty...

rows.label: bf11590150_0110
rows.name: Please, wait a moment.

rows.label: bf11590150_0120
rows.name: Adel only sought to protect your realm.

rows.label: bf11590150_0130
rows.name:
Silence!
Is your voice more important than the king's?

rows.label: bf11590150_0140
rows.name: But what of you, Zettar?

rows.label: bf11590150_0150
rows.name: What of me?

rows.label: bf11590150_0160
rows.name: Look first to yourself, I bid you.

rows.label: bf11590150_0170
rows.name: W-what do you mean...?

rows.label: bf11590150_0180
rows.name: Surely, Adel sailed the ship into a rocky reef.

rows.label: bf11590150_0190
rows.name: But if he were the bow, you were the stern.

rows.label: bf11590150_0200
rows.name: Y-Your Majesty, those are bitter words.

rows.label: bf11590150_0210
rows.name: It was Adel's vanguard that let slip Metsu!

rows.label: bf11590150_0220
rows.name: Would our army have succeeded with certainty, brother?

rows.label: bf11590150_0230
rows.name: In the hour of need, where were they?

rows.label: bf11590150_0240
rows.name:
W-we set the defense of the people as
our highest goal, Your Majesty.

rows.label: bf11590150_0250
rows.name: Our soldiers guided the townsfolk to safety.

rows.label: bf11590150_0260
rows.name:
...While Adel's militia flew, though rashly,
into the breach.

rows.label: bf11590150_0270
rows.name:
And the brave dragoons of noble Hugo wagered
their lives as mere trifles for our nation's sake.

rows.label: bf11590150_0280
rows.name: B-but...I...

rows.label: bf11590150_0290
rows.name: It unfolded thus.

rows.label: bf11590150_0300
rows.name:
If honor took its natural course,
the sons of Ira should have stood their ground.

rows.label: bf11590150_0310
rows.name: [ML:undisp ]...

rows.label: bf11590150_0320
rows.name: Mark their honor above their frailty.

rows.label: bf11590150_0330
rows.name:
You saw the battle with your own eyes,
did you not, my brother?

rows.label: bf11590150_0340
rows.name: I-I did...

rows.label: bf11590150_0350
rows.name: And how did you think it?

rows.label: bf11590150_0360
rows.name: Words can scarcely describe it.

rows.label: bf11590150_0370
rows.name:
It was unlike any mere human struggle.
I fear I could not report it justly.

rows.label: bf11590150_0380
rows.name: Indeed, brother.

rows.label: bf11590150_0390
rows.name: [ML:undisp ]?

rows.label: bf11590150_0400
rows.name: It was a fight beyond our ken.

rows.label: bf11590150_0410
rows.name: I too saw it with my own eyes.

rows.label: bf11590150_0420
rows.name:
Our Iiran craft of war would have been
doubly doomed against Metsu.

rows.label: bf11590150_0430
rows.name: That's...

rows.label: bf11590150_0440
rows.name:
Is it not folly to assume that our army could do
what Adel's could not?

rows.label: bf11590150_0450
rows.name: Your Majesty...

rows.label: bf11590150_0460
rows.name: [ML:undisp ]...

rows.label: bf11590150_0470
rows.name: Noble Hugo... My brother forgets grace and gratitude.

rows.label: bf11590150_0480
rows.name: Our nation hangs over doom like a ripened fruit.

rows.label: bf11590150_0490
rows.name: You and yours are our final ray of hope.

rows.label: bf11590150_0500
rows.name:
Will you offer us aid again,
to avenge ourselves on the Grail?

rows.label: bf11590150_0510
rows.name: We came with that very intention, Your Majesty.

rows.label: bf11590150_0520
rows.name: Didn't we, Prince Adel?

rows.label: bf11590150_0530
rows.name: Yes.

rows.label: bf11590150_0540
rows.name: Majesty...

rows.label: bf11590150_0542
rows.name:
If it must be so, I will expend my life
for the future of the land of my forefathers.

rows.label: bf11590150_0550
rows.name: While we're here...

rows.label: bf11590150_0560
rows.name: Your name is Laura is it not?

rows.label: bf11590150_0570
rows.name:
Huh, me?
Y-yes!

rows.label: bf11590150_0580
rows.name: Your work impressed me deeply.

rows.label: bf11590150_0600
rows.name: Yet you are no knight, bear no peerage...

rows.label: bf11590150_0610
rows.name: Yes... I'm from a settlement in the distant borderlands.

rows.label: bf11590150_0620
rows.name: I serve with a mercenary band.

rows.label: bf11590150_0630
rows.name: I knew you for a warrior.

rows.label: bf11590150_0640
rows.name:
Good Laura
I would like to recognize your valiant labors.

rows.label: bf11590150_0650
rows.name:
The title of knight of the realm...
It is yours, if you would accept it.

rows.label: bf11590150_0660
rows.name: Me, a knight?

rows.label: bf11590150_0670
rows.name: Laura, my congratulations

rows.label: bf11590150_0680
rows.name: I can hardly believe it... Me?

rows.label: bf11590150_0690
rows.name: Come now. A title is a mere decoration.

rows.label: bf11590150_0700
rows.name: Surely you learned that from me.

rows.label: bf11590150_0710
rows.name: I hope it will raise your spirits a little Laura.

rows.label: bf11590150_0720
rows.name: Humble Laura. I have a request I must make of you

rows.label: bf11590150_0730
rows.name:
This day, the people of our nation shiver in the
darkest of shadows, cast by mighty Metsu.

rows.label: bf11590150_0740
rows.name: But I bid that you seed a flower of hope in this shadow-mired land.

rows.label: bf11590150_0750
rows.name: I hope that I can.

rows.label: bf11590150_0760
rows.name: Your Majesty...

rows.label: bf11590150_0770
rows.name: I'll do my best.

rows.label: bf11590150_0780
rows.name: Well spoken brave Laura.

rows.label: bf11590150_0790
rows.name:
We shall annoint thee as Laura-sama
tomorrow in the plaza!
